member.name: M:CoreWebAPI.Startup.Configuredevelopment(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.IHostingEnvironment,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory)
member.summary: This is an override method that will come in play instead of Configure(...) method, provided ASPNETCORE_Environment is set to Development(Remember method name should be in same case as environment)
